text: phir jisako gulaam na mile to donon kee muqaarabat ke qabl do maheene ke pai dar pai roze rakhen aur jisako isakee bhee qudarat na ho saath mohataajon ko khaana khilaana pharz hai ye (hukm isalie hai) taaki tum khuda aur usake rasool kee (pairavee) tasadeeq karo aur ye khuda kee muqarrar haden hain aur kaafiron ke lie dardanaak azaab hai
